name: backuppc
tagline: A network backup system with deduplication and centralized management
description: BackupPC is a high-performance network backup system designed for servers and desktops. It features disk-based storage, deduplication, a web interface, and extensive scheduling for hands-off data protection.

features.title: Network Backup System
features.description: Perform centralized backups for multiple machines

features.title: Incremental Backups
features.description: Reduce storage usage using incremental backups

features.title: File Restoration
features.description: Restore files from previous backup versions

features.title: Client Support
features.description: Back up Linux, macOS, and Windows systems

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Monitor and manage backups through a browser
